content: No, I think it's great! What is the process you'd like for me to follow for this. On my end, it would be easy for me to just pop open the amendment file and add to the bottom. That it is to protect the AI-AI communication integrity of transition documents and to limit token usage for document regeneration. This document would be pushed to GitHub and provided as a link so Claude could see its version history. You told me all these things you like about different topics along the way. How'd I do?
